body: A possible avenue is to select frame size based on either BDP or bandwidth (maybe prefer just to tune based on bandwidth since BDP may still lead to smaller-than-desirable frames in high-bw low-latency environments). There should not be too many changes in frame size on an active stream since each frame size negotiation requires a round-trip.
Reassigning to @ncteisen since he's been the last one to do flow control work.
